.exit
console.log("Deployed at:", await token.getAddress());
await token.waitForDeployment(); // Ethers v6 requires this
console.log("Contract Deploying...");
const token = await Token.deploy();
console.log("Factory Loaded âœ…");
const Token = await ethers.getContractFactory("TokenAllowanceManager");
 require("ethers").version
.exit
await token.deployed();
const token = await Token.deploy();
const Token = await ethers.getContractFactory("TokenAllowanceManager");
